description.en:
[i][b]A spin-off/AU manga of Bottom-tier Character Tomozaki centered around Minami Nanami where she does not run for the student council election.[/b][/i]

Everyone has a wish to [i]shine[/i]. Minami Nanami is a high school girl with such a wish. One day, a turning point came to her. Her mother introduces her to a modeling job, and she learns about a new world—? A spin-off comic currently being serialized on Manga One, the long-awaited first volume!
[hr]
